title: Snowflake Jake Saves Snowflake Day
description: It’s Snowflake Jake against Santy Claus, Dreidelstein, and King Kwanzaa. Can he save All Religions Are Equally Valid Traditional Snowflake Day?
quote: It be time for you and your exclusionary holidays to walk to the plank.
altHero: Snowflake Jake, a blue pirate with candycane for a hook
alt2: Snowflake Jake making Santy Claus, Dreidelstein, and King Kwanzaa walk the plank
alt3: Snowflake Jake pointing at a blackboard that says “Specificity be the enemy of unity”
alt4: Santy Claus, Dreidelstein, and King Kwanzaa
